getInstance

getSetting

public java.lang.String getSetting(java.lang.String iSetting)
Returns a setting based on the final variables

Parameters:
iSetting - the name of the setting based on the final variables
Returns:
the setting as a string. For boolean values, "true" and "false" will be returned. Null will be returned if the setting doesn't exist

changeSetting

public void changeSetting(java.lang.String iSetting,
                          java.lang.String iValue)
Sets a setting based on the final variables

Parameters:
iSetting - the name of the setting based on the final variables
iValue - the desired value of the setting. For boolean values, "true" and "false" should be used
